title: Transmigrated into the World of “Demon Lord Wu Zun” - Novel Updates
tags: Ancient Times   Bestiality   Black Belly   Cannibalism   Cold Protagonist   Death   Demonic Cultivation Technique   Demons   Dense Protagonist   First-time Interc**rse   Handsome Male Lead   Love Interest Falls in Love First   Male Yandere   Misunderstandings   Mob Protagonist   Obsessive Love   Possessive Characters   R*pe Victim Becomes Lover   R*pe   Shapeshifters   Straight Seme   Strength-based Social Hierarchy   Transmigration   Writers   Yandere   Younger Love Interests
author: Fallen Clothing Becomes Fire   衣落成火
description:
Gu Bai always believed that the s*upidest thing he had ever done was listening to his bestie’s words of becoming a stallion genre novel writer. Directly following was the most frustrating thing that he had ever done, changing the previously decided upon moral, smart, healthy youngster into a big boss…

In the end, he discovered that the consequences of changing the original plot were more serious than he expected.

After meeting the pervert he wrote himself:

God Damn! He eats people ah! At this time the cannibalism I wrote can be replaced with “eating human beings” right?

In short, this is a story about a dumb author who wrote a cannibalistic story which started as a stallion story, who in the end was unable to escape the whirlpool of destiny (not really).>
